dcterms:creator: M. Blank
L. Gorelick
E. Shechtman
M. Irani

dcterms:description: A dataset used for action recognition, consisting of video sequences that represent various actions, which were trimmed to show only a single instance of each action being performed.
dcterms:title: Weizmann Action Recognition Classification Database

dcterms:description: A dataset that includes video sequences of actions, which were trimmed to show only a single instance of each action being performed.
dcterms:title: Weizmann Database
